column4: Is there a way to reset my firefox and remove all installed plugins? I have been toying around with it and now it's acting up weirdly. apt-get removing it requires that I remove my entire ubuntu-desktop which would suck
removing ubuntu-desktop isn't as bad as it sounds, just reinstall it back, it's not gonna remove your desktop as it would lead you to believe
I've been running with out the ubuntu-desktop package for like 4 days without realizing it, and I just reinstalled it last night
just after it removes it, search it in Synaptic and reinstall, and no prob. You may want to make sure the package "yelp" doesn't get uninstalled too
